Item.Name: Poke Doll
Item.Effect: Target Pokemon with an Intelligence Capability of 4 or lower is distracted for 1d6 turns, during which time it will not attack or pursue any targets unless it is provoked.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Pomeg Berry
Item.Effect: Only if you want it to, it will lower the Pokemon’s HP Base Stat 1.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Potion
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: Power Herb
Item.Effect: If used while performing one of the following Moves: SolarBeam, Skull Bash, Sky Attack, Razor Wind, Fly, Dig, Dive, Bounce or Shadow Force, act as if you have already performed any turn requirements in the Effect and perform the second turn on the Move.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: PP Up
Item.Effect: Raise one of the user’s Move’s Frequency one level. Use only once per Move.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon. Can be used to modify a Pokémon's base stats. Only five Vitamins may be in effect on any one Pokémon.

Item.Name: Premier Ball
Item.Effect: 0 Capture Rate; Given as promotional balls during sales.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, to capture Pokémon.

Item.Name: Protector
Item.Notes: Can be used to make certain Pokémon evolve.

Item.Name: Protector
Item.Effect: If the holder would be hit by a Move that would deal x4 Damage after applying Weaknesses, instead for that Move, only take x2 Damage.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Protein
Item.Effect: Raise the user’s Attack Base Stat 1.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon. Can be used to modify a Pokémon's base stats. Only five Vitamins may be in effect on any one Pokémon.

Item.Name: Qualot Berry
Item.Effect: Only if you want it to, it will lower the Pokemon’s Defense Base Stat 1.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Quick Ball

Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, to capture Pokémon.

Item.Effect: The holder adds their STAB value to their Speed Stat for the purposes of determining turn order.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Quick Weed

Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon. Can be used to modify a Pokémon's base stats. Only five Vitamins may be in effect on any one Pokémon.

Item.Name: Razor Claw
Item.Notes: Can be used to make certain Pokémon evolve.

Item.Name: Razor Claw
Item.Effect: Attacks are Critical Hits on a roll of 18-20. This does not stack with any Abilities, Moves, or Effects that extend Critical Hit rate.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Razor Fang
Item.Notes: Can be used to make certain Pokémon evolve.

Item.Name: Razor Fang
Item.Effect: Melee Attacks cause the target to Flinch on a roll of 19-20. This does not stack with any Abilities, Moves, or Effects that extend Flinch rate.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Razz Berry
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Reaper Cloth
Item.Notes: Can be used to make certain Pokémon evolve.

Item.Name: Reaper Cloth
Item.Effect: The holder covers themselves in the Reaper Cloth, making any Ranged attack target through Rough Terrain for the remainder of the encounter. This will activate the Stealth Capability.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Red Apricorn
Item.Notes: Can be used to make Aprijuice or specialty Pokéballs.

Item.Name: Red Flute
Item.Effect: When played, all Pokemon within 3m afflicted with Infatuation are cured.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans.

Item.Name: Repeat Ball

Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, to capture Pokémon.

Item.Name: Repel
Item.Notes: Greatly annoys Pokémon. Can only be used by humans.

Item.Name: Revival Herb

Item.Name: Revive

Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Toxic Orb
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Trainer’s Road Kit
Item.Effect: Backpack, Bedroll, Tent-1x1m, Poke Ball belt, Solar-Rechargeable Flashlight, Tarp-2x2m (Backpack with everything inside is about 20kg, lots of room left)

Item.Name: Training Stick
Item.Effect: The Holder’s Melee Moves that do not include the word Head, Kick or Punch have an increased Range of 2, but are still Melee Moves.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Type Boosters
Item.Effect: These items come in a variety of each of the Elemental Types, and grant a STAB bonus to a particular Type’s Moves, regardless if the holder is the same Type as the Move.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Type Plates
Item.Effect: Plates are ancient tiles, the size of a business card, and grant 2 STAB bonus to a particular Type’s Moves, regardless if the holder is the same Type as the Move.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Ultra Ball
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, to capture Pokémon.

Item.Name: Up-Grade
Item.Notes: Can be used to make certain Pokémon evolve.

Item.Name: Up-Grade
Item.Effect: The holder, when gaining EXP, gains an additional 15 EXP.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Wacan Berry
Item.Effect: If hit by a super-effective Electric-Type Move, the attack deals neutral damage instead.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Water Stone
Item.Effect: Evolves Poliwhirl, Shellder, Staryu, Eevee, Lombre, Panpour
Item.Notes: Can be used to make certain Pokémon evolve.

Item.Name: Watmel Berry
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Wepear Berry
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: White Apricorn
Item.Notes: Can be used to make Aprijuice or specialty Pokéballs.

Item.Name: White Flute
Item.Effect: When played, target a wild pokemon within 10m of you. Roll 1d20; if you roll higher than a 15 and the Pokemon is less than 10 levels higher than an allied active pokemon, the targeted pokemon cries out for allies. The GM determines how many more wild Pokemon join the encounter.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans.

Item.Name: White Herb
Item.Effect: Any negative Combat Stages are set to 0.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Wide Lens
Item.Effect: Activate before making an Accuracy Roll. The user needs to roll -3 to hit on its next Accuracy Roll. A roll of 1 always misses.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle.

Item.Name: Wiki Berry
Item.Effect: Recovers 1/8th of pokemon’s Max HP. Confuses Pokemon who don’t like Dry food.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Writer’s Kit
Item.Effect: Two Notebooks (one unlined, one lined), pack of four pencils and four pens

Item.Name: X Accuracy
Item.Effect: The user’s Accuracy Checks are lowered by 2
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: X Attack
Item.Effect: Raises the user’s Attack 1 Combat Stage
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: X Defend
Item.Effect: Raises the user’s Defense 1 Combat Stage
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: X Sp. Def
Item.Effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense 1 Combat Stage
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: X Special
Item.Effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack 1 Combat Stage
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: X Speed
Item.Effect: Raises the user’s Speed 1 Combat Stage
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon.

Item.Name: Yache Berry
Item.Effect: If hit by a super-effective Ice-Type Move, the attack deals neutral damage instead.
Item.Notes: Can be held by Pokémon for use during battle. Can be used on Pokémon and humans, by Pokémon and humans. Can be used to make Berry Juice, Pokeblocks, and Poffins.

Item.Name: Yellow Apricorn
Item.Notes: Can be used to make Aprijuice or specialty Pokéballs.

Item.Name: Yellow Flute
Item.Effect: When played, all Pokemon within 3m afflicted with Confusion are cured.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans.

Item.Name: Zinc
Item.Effect: Raise the user’s Special Defense Base Stat 1.
Item.Notes: Can only be used by humans, on Pokémon. Can be used to modify a Pokémon's base stats. Only five Vitamins may be in effect on any one Pokémon.
